document.title: WEL_UP_DOWN_CONTROL
document.paragraph:
A ../../reference/controls/WEL_UP_DOWN_CONTROL_chart.xmlWEL_UP_DOWN_CONTROL consists of a pair of arrows which are used to increment or decrement a value. Using set_buddy_window, a window of type ../../reference/windows/WEL_WINDOW_chart.xmlWEL_WINDOW can be linked to this control, and is commonly used to display the current value.
